title: New: Luca Fogale – I Don't Want To Lose You
body:
Really loved **Luca Fogale’s** album from last year, showcasing his stunning voice and knack for finding a killer hook.

Returning with his first new material of 2017, _I Don’t Want To Lose You_ is another slice of emotionally fraught songwriting genius; perhaps more obviously commercially orientated than anything on his debut LP, it’s no less affecting. Give this track to a Sam Smith or a John Legend and you’ve got a hit on your hands. Check it out below.
